resources.string: Customize the looks to your liking. More themes will be available in the future.
Disable your phone\'s system while performing calculations. We don\'t want you getting distracted.
Be able to do your calculations from within your homescreen or lockscreen with this simple widget!
Multitask with a pop up version of the application. It is resizable and allows you to open multiple sessions.
Unleash the power of graphing with this plugin! Advanced math has never been easier.
Simply tap on a plugin and touch the \"Activate\" button to enable it. More are coming soon!\n\nTip: Enabling a plugin unlocks new settings
Select the amount of time for which you wish to lockdown your phone during calculator use. \n\nUse hours and minutes respectively.
